CalculatedField.Name: Employees in beginning of the year
Employee Total
CalculatedField.Expression: [Employees in beginning of the year] + [Employees End Period]

CustomProperties.description: Employee Turnover is calculated by dividing the number of terminated employees by the average number of employees in the period.
This is only for Profit and Loss data, not Balance Sheet
Trailing 12 Months is aggregated to the company level.

Simple.Name: Terminated with less than one year stay

CustomProperties.description: Displays Revenue, Materials, Subcontractors, COGS, Gross Profit, Indirect and Net Profit as percent of sales Scroll down if Net Profit is not visible

CustomProperties.description: Twice a year we open the iCalibrate Peer Group to new members. If you are interested in learning more about becoming a member of this exclusive group, contact team@include.com
